name: Hot Wallet
description: Hot wallet program that will sign and transfer blockchain transactions

PROJECT_ID.description: The hot wallet will be registered to sign transactions for that CoMakery's project id

PROJECT_API_KEY.description: Api key generated on CoMakery for the PROJECT_ID provided

COMAKERY_SERVER_URL.description: Api key generated on CoMakery for the PROJECT_ID provided

PURESTAKE_API.description: Api key generated on Purestake to operate with Algorand blockchain

CHECK_FOR_NEW_TRANSACTIONS_DELAY.description: Timeout in second between checking for new transactions to send

BLOCKCHAIN_NETWORK.description: Which network should we use for the hot wallet: algorand, algorand_test, algorand_beta

MAX_AMOUNT_FOR_TRANSFER.description: Maximum amount of tokens to send. Value 100000000 is mean 1 NOTE token (1 x 10^-8), 0 for unlimited. Unlimited by default

ETHEREUM_TOKEN_SYMBOL.description: Ethereum Token symbol (CERE for example). It uses to get a balance of the token

ETHEREUM_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.description: Ethereum contract address of the token. It uses to get a balance of the token
